name: Kingdom's Harvester
description:
In this point-and-click game, you are a farmer and you need to feed your people and at the same time earn money to not go bankrupt.

Use the shop to buy crops and store them in your inventory once harvested!

Are you a good farmer and you succeed to feed your people for a long time? Or are you a bad farmer and let your people die? Let's find out!

Developer word: 

The concept is pretty simple but the game is maybe a little hard or too easy, please tell me if need to balance the game. Your opinion really matters to me,  help me to make better games in the future! I let you discover the game, have fun!
